original_text: Now the name of the Israelite that was slain, even that was slain with the Midianitish woman, was Zimri, the son of Salu, a prince of a chief house among the Simeonites.
korean_text: 죽임을 당한 이스라엘 남자 곧 미디안 여인과 함께 죽임을 당한 자의 이름은 시므리니 살루의 아들이요 시므온인의 조상의 가문 중 한 지도자이며

sentences.original_text: Now the name of the Israelite
even that was slain with the Midianitish woman
sentences.korean_translation: 미디안 여인과 함께 죽임을 당한 자

sentences.original_text: a prince of a chief house
